structure.name: TPM_AUTH_DATA_USAGE
structure.description: Indicates the conditions where it is required that authorization be presented.

structure.name: TPM_PAYLOAD_TYPE
structure.description: The information as to what the payload is in an encrypted structure

structure.name: TPM_VERSION_BYTE
structure.description: The version info breakdown

structure.name: TPM_DA_STATE
structure.description: The state of the dictionary attack mitigation logic

structure.name: TPM_TAG
structure.description: The request or response authorization type.

structure.name: TPM_PROTOCOL_ID
structure.description: The protocol in use.

structure.name: TPM_STARTUP_TYPE
structure.description: Indicates the start state.

structure.name: TPM_ENC_SCHEME
structure.description: The definition of the encryption scheme.

structure.name: TPM_SIG_SCHEME
structure.description: The definition of the signature scheme.

structure.name: TPM_MIGRATE_SCHEME
structure.description: The definition of the migration scheme

structure.name: TPM_PHYSICAL_PRESENCE
structure.description: Sets the state of the physical presence mechanism.

structure.name: TPM_ENTITY_TYPE
structure.description: Indicates the types of entity that are supported by the TPM.

structure.name: TPM_KEY_USAGE
structure.description: Indicates the permitted usage of the key.

structure.name: TPM_EK_TYPE
structure.description: The type of asymmetric encrypted structure in use by the endorsement key

structure.name: TPM_STRUCTURE_TAG
structure.description: The tag for the structure

structure.name: TPM_PLATFORM_SPECIFIC
structure.description: The platform specific spec to which the information relates to

structure.name: TPM_COMMAND_CODE
structure.description: The command ordinal.

structure.name: TPM_CAPABILITY_AREA
structure.description: Identifies a TPM capability area.

structure.name: TPM_KEY_FLAGS
structure.description: Indicates information regarding a key.

structure.name: TPM_ALGORITHM_ID
structure.description: Indicates the type of algorithm.

structure.name: TPM_MODIFIER_INDICATOR
structure.description: The locality modifier

structure.name: TPM_ACTUAL_COUNT
structure.description: The actual number of a counter.

structure.name: TPM_TRANSPORT_ATTRIBUTES
structure.description: Attributes that define what options are in use for a transport session

structure.name: TPM_AUTHHANDLE
structure.description: Handle to an authorization session

structure.name: TPM_DIRINDEX
structure.description: Index to a DIR register

structure.name: TPM_KEY_HANDLE
structure.description: The area where a key is held assigned by the TPM.

structure.name: TPM_PCRINDEX
structure.description: Index to a PCR register

structure.name: TPM_RESULT
structure.description: The return code from a function

structure.name: TPM_RESOURCE_TYPE
structure.description: The types of resources that a TPM may have using internal resources

structure.name: TPM_KEY_CONTROL
structure.description: Allows for controlling of the key when loaded and how to handle TPM_Startup issues

structure.name: TPM_NV_INDEX
structure.description: The index into the NV storage area

structure.name: TPM_FAMILY_ID
structure.description: The family ID. Families IDâ€™s are automatically assigned a sequence number by the TPM. A trusted process can set the FamilyID value in an individual row to zero, which invalidates that row. The family ID resets to zero on each change of TPM Owner.

structure.name: TPM_FAMILY_VERIFICATION
structure.description: A value used as a label for the most recent verification of this family. Set to zero when not in use.

structure.name: TPM_STARTUP_EFFECTS
structure.description: How the TPM handles var

structure.name: TPM_SYM_MODE
structure.description: The mode of a symmetric encryption

structure.name: TPM_FAMILY_FLAGS
structure.description: The family flags

structure.name: TPM_DELEGATE_INDEX
structure.description: The index value for the delegate NV table

structure.name: TPM_CMK_DELEGATE
structure.description: The restrictions placed on delegation of CMK commands

structure.name: TPM_COUNT_ID
structure.description: The ID value of a monotonic counter

structure.name: TPM_REDIT_COMMAND
structure.description: A command to execute

structure.name: TPM_TRANSHANDLE
structure.description: A transport session handle

structure.name: TPM_HANDLE
structure.description: A generic handle could be key, transport etc.

structure.name: TPM_FAMILY_OPERATION
structure.description: What operation is happening

structure.name: TPM_CHOSENID_HASH
structure.description: This SHALL be the digest of the chosen identityLabel and privacyCA for a new TPM identity.

structure.name: TPM_COMPOSITE_HASH
structure.description: This SHALL be the hash of a list of PCR indexes and PCR values that a key or data is bound to.

structure.name: TPM_DIRVALUE
structure.description: This SHALL be the value of a DIR register

structure.name: TPM_HMAC
structure.description: This shall be the output of the HMAC algorithm

structure.name: TPM_PCRVALUE
structure.description: The value inside of the PCR

structure.name: TPM_AUDITDIGEST
structure.description: This SHALL be the value of the current internal audit state

structure.name: TPM_DAA_TPM_SEED
structure.description: This SHALL be a random value generated by a TPM immediately after the EK is installed in that TPM, whenever an EK is installed in that TPM

structure.name: TPM_DAA_CONTEXT_SEED
structure.description: This SHALL be a random value

structure.name: TPM_SECRET
structure.description: A secret plaintext value used in the authorization process.

structure.name: TPM_ENCAUTH
structure.description: A ciphertext (encrypted) version of AuthData data. The encryption mechanism depends on the context.
